settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.text: Please refer to our dedicated Shipping & Returns page.

settings.title: Will your scrub caps fit me?
settings.text: Yes! Our standard caps fit heads from XS to XL, and our XL+ caps can stretch much larger.

settings.title: Would your scrub caps fit a really big watermelon?
settings.text:
What a bizarre question. But, okay, let’s logic it out: 

We designed XL+ caps to cover long thick hair. They stretch up to 73cm.

Thanks to a sneaky measure-mission at our local supermarket, we can confirm that a watermelon with a 73cm circumference is pretty darn big. 

So yes! Our scrub caps can cover a really big watermelon.

settings.title: I have long hair. Will it fit inside your scrub cap?
settings.text:
We designed our caps to cover long hair in a bun — none of this ponytail-dangling-out-the-back business. 

At the back of each scrub cap, you’ll find a special elastic band. The band allows the cap to stretch over a large hair bun, and still tie snuggly against your head. 

Our standard scrub caps stretch up to 64cm. This is suitable for medium-length hair in most cases. 

We made the XL+ scrub cap for long thick hair. It stretches up to an impressive 73cm! That’s 7XL in hat sizes.

settings.title: What size scrub cap should I get?
settings.text:
There are two sizes, standard and XL+. If you’re not sure which one you need, the best option is to measure your head. Here’s how:

STEP 1: Tie your hair in a bun (if necessary.) When you wear our caps, you should position your bun just below the crown of your head. But, for measuring only, we suggest tying your bun lower — roughly in line with your nose.

STEP 2: Measure the circumference of your head, including your hair. 

STEP 3: Select a size. Standard XS– XL is suitable for up to 62cm. XL+ is suitable for up to 73cm.

settings.title: How do I put my scrub cap on?
settings.text:
Instructions for short hair:  

1. Position the scrub hat on your head.

2. Pull the sides of the cap down firmly while you fasten the ties at the back.

Instructions for medium and long hair:  

1. Tie your hair in a bun just below the crown of your head.

2. Position the scrub hat on your head. Make sure the cap’s elastic band sits underneath your bun. 

3. Pull the sides of the cap down firmly while you fasten the ties at the back. 

Having trouble? Here’s a video to help you out.

[R3a3F2mQUDg]

settings.title: My hair will not fit in the scrub cap. What should I do?
settings.text:
Before you panic, check you’ve put your bun in the right place.

• If you can’t pull the cap down fully onto your head, the bun is probably too high.

• If your hair is poking out the back of the cap, the bun is probably too low.

settings.title: What are your scrub caps made of?
settings.text:
Our scrub caps are 100% cotton. That’s what makes them so cosy and soft.

Our perfect match scrub caps are made from the same material as our scrubs (20% Rayon, 6% Spandex & 74% Poly)

settings.title: How do I wash my scrub cap?
settings.text:
Regular machine wash with like colours in temperature no higher than 40C/104F.

Hang dry only. Most of our caps are 100% cotton, which means they can shrink in the dryer.

settings.title: The scrub cap I wanted is out of stock. Will it be back?
settings.text:
We can't give an ETA on restocks. But, we can make sure you're the first to know when one takes place.

Go to the product page and use the EMAIL WHEN AVAILABLE button to request a back in stock email.

settings.title: How frilly are your scrunchies?
settings.text: Our scrunchies are 6cm wide for a large (but not unprofessional) frill that really lets our prints show.

settings.title: How big do your scrunchies stretch?
settings.text:
This scrunchie stretches comfortably up to 45cm around. You can use it with one, two or three loops depending on your hair thickness. 

For longevity of the elastic, always tie your scrunchie so that a thumb can be inserted easily under the elastic band.

settings.title: What are your scrunchies made of?
settings.text:
Printed scrunchies are:
100% Cotton Outer 

Polyester elastic band inside. 


Plain scrunchies are:
74% Polyester
20% Rayon
6% Spandex
Polyester elastic band inside.

settings.title: How do I wash my scrunchie?
settings.text:
Printed scrunchies: Machine wash up to 40°C with like colours then air dry.

Plain scrunchies: Cold machine wash inside-out. Tumble dry low.

settings.title: How long will the elastic in a Dr. Woof scrunchie last?
settings.text:
Over time elastic can lose its stretchiness — especially if it is stretched out too far for long periods of time.  For longevity, always tie your scrunchie so that a thumb can be inserted easily under the elastic band.

And if you need to replace the elastic, it’s super easy. Check out tutorials on youtube!

settings.title: Can I return my scrunchie?
settings.text:
Scrunchies are part of our 60-day money back guarantee. They must be returned unworn with the tags attached.

For hygiene reasons we will not be able to resell returned scrunchies. So to avoid waste, please do think carefully about your purchase.

settings.title: How does your 3for2 Scrunch Bunch deal work?
settings.text: Just add three to your cart, and watch in wonder as one auto-magically becomes free at checkout.

settings.title: Will your face masks fit me?
settings.text: Yes. Our masks are one-size-fits-all.

settings.title: What are your face masks made out of?
settings.text: 68% Rayon, 17% Nylon, 2% Lycra 13% Bioserica.® Bioserca® is a natural fabric scientifically proven to kill bacteria.

settings.title: I want my mask to have a good seal. How do I fit it?
settings.text:
There are two steps: 

1. Use the adjustable earloops to pull the mask tightly around your face. 

2. Bend the metal nose bridge to create a snug fit around your nose.

settings.title: What is PM 2.5?
settings.text: PM2.5 particles are over 100x thinner than a strand of hair. You can find them in smoke and smoke polluted air. PM2.5 particles are dangerous to breathe in. Luckily, PM2.5 filters catch most of them.

settings.title: Are your masks medical grade?
settings.text: No. Our masks are for everyday wear.

settings.title: How often should I change the PM 2.5 filter?
settings.text: It depends on where you are and how often you are using the filter. At the very least, we suggest changing the filter once for every 12 hours of use.

settings.title: How do I clean my mask?
settings.text: Hand wash in warm water, or machine wash in a delicates bag. Air dry only.

settings.title: How big are your charms?
settings.text: Our charms are around 25mm x 25mm. If you don’t have a ruler nearby — that’s around the size of a bottle cap.

settings.title: What are your charms made of?
settings.text:
Our charms are 100% copper with nickel electroplating for durability.

Important note: We choose nickel plating because stethoscopes get banged around a lot. Nickel is incredibly strong and durable. However, it can cause allergies and other issues for some people. Nickel is not recommended for wear directly on the skin.

settings.title: I am allergic to nickel, can I wear your charms?
settings.text:
Our charms are not intended to come into prolonged contact with the skin. When placed correctly, they would spend most of the day sitting on top of your scrubs, lab coat or work clothes. 

Even so, we do not recommend our charms for people with a nickel allergy.

settings.title: How do I attach the charm to my stethoscope?
settings.text:
1. Slip the Dr. Woof stethoscope cuff around your stethoscope tubing.

2. Position the cuff towards the top of the tubing, just below where the earpieces branch out.

3. Squeeze the cuff shut and clip on your charm.

[kFEiUsh45Lk]

Once you’ve attached the charm, make sure that you have positioned it correctly. There are two tests to do.

TEST ONE: Put the stethoscope on. Hold the bell against your chest. Make sure there is no interference with auscultation. If interference occurs, loosen the cuff, slide it further away from your stethoscope bell, and re-tighten.

TEST TWO: Hang the stethoscope around your neck sideways and then by the earpieces. Make sure the charm sits comfortably on top of your scrub uniform.

settings.title: Where do I attach the charm to my stethoscope?
settings.text: Place the charm on the tubing of the stethoscope, just below where the earpieces branch off.

settings.title: Can I attach more than one charm to my stethoscope?
settings.text: Yes. You can clip multiple charms to a Dr. Woof stethoscope cuff. You can also put multiple Dr. Woof cuffs on your stethoscope.

settings.title: Do your charms interfere with auscultation?
settings.text: No. When the charm is attached in the correct position, there is no interference.

settings.title: Are your charms suitable for healthcare workers in high-risk areas?
settings.text: Check with your workplace. Our charms are easy to clean and disinfect. But, this does not mean that every workplace will allow them.

settings.title: I don’t carry a stethoscope. Can I attach the charm somewhere else?
settings.text:
Yes. You can attach the charm to bags or keys. It comes with a ring to help you do this. 

Please note that our charms are not jewellery, and you should not wear them in direct contact with the skin.

settings.title: Are your scrubs true to size?
settings.text:
Yes. A vast majority of the people who buy our scrubs are happy with the fit.

If you are not sure what size to get, the best option is to compare your measurements to the measurements on our sizing chart.

settings.title: What size am I?
settings.text:
Check our sizing chart to find your size.

Women
Men

settings.title: Do you have petite and tall sizes?
settings.text: Yes. Our core colors come in regular, petite & tall. Depending on expected demand, limited edition releases may not include tall & petite options.

settings.title: How do I care for my Dr. Woof Scrubs?
settings.text:
Scrubs: Cold machine wash inside-out. Tumble dry low. 

Underscrubs: Cold machine wash inside-out. Tumble dry low.

settings.title: Will you be offering more sizes & colours soon?
settings.text:
Yes. Our range is always expanding.

Join our mailing list (signup link below) for announcements.

settings.title: Any plans for larger sizes?
settings.text: Yes! We have added 3XL in late 2023, and we will continue to expand the range moving forward.

settings.title: What are your vests filled with?
settings.text: As you might expect, the 50 Down vest is filled with 50% Down. This mixed with 50% waterfowl feather.

settings.title: Are your vests waterproof?
settings.text: The vest outer is 100% nylon. This is water resistant and wipes down eaily.

settings.title: Will you have a vegan outerwear option?
settings.text: Yes. We have fleece jackets, with more options coming soon.

settings.title: How do I care for my vest?
settings.text:
The Featherlight 50 Down Vest wipes down easily & can be spot cleaned using warm water or any neutral detergent. 

For thorough cleaning: Handwash in water up to 40° with a neutral detergent. Then rinse in clean water. Compress the jacket to get the water out - wringing or twisting will damage the down .

settings.title: What size am I?
settings.text:
Our vests are sized to match our scrub-tops and underscrubs. So if you know your Dr. Woof top size... you're away laughing.

If you are not sure of your top size, you can check our size guide:

Men's
Women's

settings.title: Do you offer embroidery?
settings.text:
Yes. We can add embroidery to all of our clothing for you.

Our service is fully customisable. We have a huge range of colours, fonts and designs available. We can even embroider clinic logos and personal artwork.

Contact us to get a quote

settings.title: How do I add embroidery to my order?
settings.text:
Embroidery cannot be ordered online.

To allow full customisation, our team will talk with you to organise your order.

Contact us today to get started.

settings.title: How long does embroidery take?
settings.text: It depends on what you’d like embroidered. Please allow 2–3 extra weeks for embroidered items to arrive.

settings.title: What embroidery colours, fonts and font-sizes can I choose from?
settings.text:
Our service is fully customisable.

Unlike other scrubs embroidery services, you are not limited to two or three options. You can select the
design that is right for you.

Contact us today to organise your order.

settings.title: Do you embroider logos and artwork?
settings.text:
Yes! Show us your design and we’ll make sure it is embodiable. If it is, we’ll organize a quote.

Please note: for logos and artwork, there will be a fee to set up the embroidery plate. This fee will only apply once, no matter how many garments you decide to get your design added to.

Contact us today to discuss your design.

settings.title: Can I add embroidery to a team or bulk order?
settings.text: Yes! Talk to the Dr. Woof  team member who is looking after your order. They’ll confirm prices for you.

settings.title: Where on my scrubs can I place embroidery?
settings.text:
Tell us where you want it! Our service is fully customisable. You are not limited to left or right chest.

Contact us today to organise your order.

settings.title: Why is there no free shipping option?
settings.text:
We offer free shipping Australia wide on all orders over $100 AUD. International orders will incur a shipping cost.

US residents can get free shipping on orders over $60USD by shopping in our US store.

If you are ordring for delivery in Australia and have spent over $80 AUD:

1. Check you’re looking at the order value in AUD.

2. Check you’ve used the correct country in your address.

3. Contact us

settings.title: My promo code is not working.
settings.text:
If your promo code is not working:

1. Check you entered the code correctly.

2. Make sure you’ve met the terms.

3. Contact us

*You can only use one code per order (including bundle discount codes.) For more information on how our codes work, visit our deals and discounts page.

settings.title: Where do I enter my promo code?
settings.text:
Enter your promo code in the box at checkout.

If you are browsing on mobile, you will need to click 'show order summary' to find the promo code box.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text: We accept VISA, AMEX, Mastercard, Stripe, Google Pay, Apple Pay and Paypal.

settings.title: Is your payment method secure?
settings.text: Yes. Our payments are processed by Paypal or Stripe. They are both secure and reliable payment providers.

settings.title: Do you have Afterpay?
settings.text: Yes. You can purchase using afterpay if you would like.

settings.title: How do you protect my details?
settings.text: Check out our privacy policy.

settings.title: Do you offer a bulk discount?
settings.text: Yes. Visit our corporate gifting and team order page for more details. Or, contact our team.

settings.title: Do you sell wholesale?
settings.text: Yes, but we’ll need to have a chat first. Contact us to organise a time.

settings.title: Can you do custom designs and embroidery?
settings.text: Yes. Visit our corporate gifting and team order page for more details. Or, contact our team.

settings.title: Why do orthopaedic specialists wear Dr. Woof scrubs?
settings.text: They want their workplace tibia bit humerus.

settings.title: Why do urologists wear Dr. Woof scrubs?
settings.text: When urine the middle of a long shift, comfortable scrubs can make a vas deferens to your mood.

settings.title: Why do doctors, nurses, and healthcare workers wear Dr. Woof scrubs?
settings.text:
Because they’re comfy and they make you smile.

Sorry. This one’s not a joke — it’s more of a fun fact.

settings.title: Are you looking for ambassadors?
settings.text: Yes we are always looking to work closely with healthcare influencers across all disciplines! Doctors, Nurses, Dentists, Veterinarians, and more! Click this link to learn more.

settings.title: As healthcare workers we go out of our way to make patients feel seen & heard. But who's doing the same for us?
settings.text: We made Rounds for the people behind the scrubs. We want to show the world what makes us laugh, what makes us cry, what makes our blood boil and what makes our hearts burst.

settings.code:

settings.title: MEDICAL WEAR BY MEDICAL WORKERS
settings.text:
Have you ever stopped mid-shift, adjusted your sweaty, scratchy scrub uniform, and thought:

"Whoever designed this thing, has never worn scrubs."

Us too! At Dr. Woof, our scrubs are everything scrubs should be. They are soft as heaven. They're comfy as hell. They make you smile - because every healthcare worker on earth deserves a smile.

settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to tell a story, explain a detail about your product, or describe a new promotion.

settings.text_2: Get your work wardrobe sorted in one swoop. Dr. Woof scrubs are wrinkle-resistant, famously soft, and cut to look sharp (even after a 14 hour on call sift.

settings.title: Light AF
settings.text: A woven mesh knit upper and an ultra-lightweight midsole create a weightless feel —  because carrying yourself through a shift is hard enough without carrying heavy shoes.

settings.title: Extreme Comfort
settings.text: We’ve got outer casing and a signature foot-supporting lacing system — for a fit so cosy and snug it feels like a sock.

settings.title: Matchy Match
settings.text: This premium quality treat for your feet is a treat for your fashion sense too. The colour is a perfect match for our baby pink scrubs.

settings.code: SHOP BABY PINK

Hello & Welcome

We're Ron, Dave and An — the oddball group of Aussie healthcare workers behind Dr. Woof scrubs.

We're a pretty light-hearted bunch. But, we're going to put our serious scrub caps on for a moment and tell you about why we created Dr. Woof.

Our Story

In university, we got sick of hearing statistics about stress and burnout in medical fields. In our medical careers, we got sick of seeing those statistics play out on the faces of our friends and colleagues. And, we got sick of seeing them in the mirror too.

To us, Dr. Woof is more than a brand of scrubs. It's a way for us to make the medical world smile.

Our goal is to create medical apparel that is a joy to look at and a joy to wear. We can't take the heartbreak out of medicine, but through comfortable, functional and playful designs we can bring little pops of joy into the everyday life of the people who wear our brand.

settings.title: OUR PRODUCTS
settings.text:
We want you to feel like you're wearing a cosy tracksuit and look like you've stepped out of a fashion magazine. Everything we make is functional, breathable and soft. It's also

Inclusive — because no one likes to see their colleagues left out. 

Fun — every time you wear it, you’ve got at least one little reason to smile.

settings.title: OUR COMMUNITY
settings.text:
In 2020 the world realised how smart and dedicated healthcare workers are. One thing they haven't realised yet — we're also hilarious.

Our community —The Woof Pack — make us snort with laughter. Every. Single. Day.

settings.title: YOUR NEW GO-TO SCRUB UNIFORM
settings.title_1: Softer than Pyjamas
settings.text_1: Our scrubs are 20% rayon, 6% spandex, and so cosy soft you'll want a second pair for bedtime.
settings.title_2: Made for Movement
settings.text_2: Goodbye scratchy, sweaty scrub uniforms. Hello breathable, sweat-wicking fabric with 4-way stretch.
settings.text_3: Iron man? 100k ultra-run? Pfft. We tested our scrubs on the most extreme event known to man— a Friday night on-call shift.

settings.title: MEET Your New Go-To Scrub Uniform
settings.text:
Comfortable but functional. Thick but breathable. Durable but stretchy.

Soft but hardcore.

settings.title: Why You'll Love Our Scrubs
settings.title_1: 20% Rayon (aka vegan silk) for a feel so soft you'll want a second pair for bedtime.

settings.title: YOUR LONG-SHIFT SECRET WEAPON
settings.title_1: Softer than Puppy Kisses
settings.text_1: Our underscrubs are 95% fine cotton, 5% spandex and so snuggly-soft you won't want to stop petting them.
settings.title_2: Made for Movement
settings.text_2: They're thick enough to fight the fiercest air-con, but breathable enough to keep you cool when the pressure is on.
settings.text_3: Avoid long-shift robot syndrome! We put a pop of personality under your scrubs to make you smile and remind you you're human.

settings.subtitle: Mission update
settings.title: #OPERATIONWOOF
settings.text: In 2022, our mission to make the medical world smile kicked into high gear. We introduced you to interesting people in the medical community, released new caps by medical artists and are getting ready to launch new projects in support of YOUR favorite charities.
LIMITED OFFER: Use code SCRUBUP for 10% off your first set

settings.code:
SCRUBUP


Have you ever stopped mid-shift, adjusted your sweaty, scratchy scrub uniform, and thought:
"Whoever designed this thing has never worn scrubs!"

Us too! Which is why we started Dr. Woof. We make the soft-as-heaven, comfy-as-hell scrubs you'd design yourself (if you weren't too busy being a total med-life badass.)

SHOP SCRUB SETS

settings.testimonial_1: Best work pants I’ve had in a 20+year career. LOVE them!!

settings.title_2: Are they scrub pants? Are they yoga pants? Are they the comfiest pants you'll ever own? Yes. Yes. And, hell yes!

settings.title_1: A slick, streamlined look in our softer-than-pajamas fabric — for days when you want to be business casual, not business uncomfortable.
settings.title_2: Why stick to one look? With amazing deals on 2, 4 and 5 sets you can have a different vibe every single day of the week.

settings.testimonial_1: Love going to work in something as comfortable as pyjamas, that looks great too!

settings.code:
WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

GRAB THIS DEAL




*Figures are based on 104 washes per set at 4 shifts a week. Experiences may vary. See our calculations here.

settings.custom_html:
A sneak peek at the year to come … shhhh

Hey Woof Pack,

Ron, Dave and An here. We can’t thank you enough for your support last year.

When we started this little Australian scrubs brand in 2019, we had no idea how many amazing healthcare professionals we’d get to meet. To us, Dr Woof Apparel is more just a place where you can buy medical scrubs and accessories online – it’s a vehicle that we can use to bring joy to the medical world.

In 2023 we’ll be ramping up our mission to make the medical world smile. If you’re curious, here’s what we’ll be focusing on:

1. New collabs with charities that you know and respect.

2. Growing ROUNDS by Dr. Woof

Rounds is a project that we started in 2022 with the aim of giving healthcare workers a louder voice on social media. It’s already starting conversations about important healthcare topics on Tiktok, Instagram & Youtube.

3. Green scrubs.

No, not green the color. We’re working on a new environmentally friendly, fully-recycled premium scrubs fabric that’s just as soft as our famous softer-than-pajamas blend.

4. Hospital scrubs that don’t suck

We’re looking into a few exciting options for getting Dr. Woof scrubs and accessory options for our friends in public and private hospitals.

5. More of the scrubs and medical accessories you love

We’re also working on more fun, comfortable. premium quality scrub caps, stethoscope charms, underscrubs and medical scrubs – including this beauty (eta February.)

settings.txt4: "So Comfortable - I’ve ordered more" — Tess E.
settings.txt5: "Excellent quality. Excellent fabric. Creating an excellent fit" — Mike P.
settings.txt6: "I find that since wearing the compression socks I don't get sore feet like I used to!" Heidy D.
settings.txt7: "Love my little stethoscope charm! Everyone asks about it" — Emma C.
settings.txt8: "The comfiest 4-way stretch scrubs I’ve ever worn!"  Sehrish K.
settings.txt9: "Love the quality and fit. Best scrubs I have ever had." — Rosa Natalia
settings.txt10: "Best pair of scrubs I have owned. Comfortable and stylish." — Zaffer Malik M.
settings.txt11: "LOVE LOVE LOVE these scrubs. Super comfy and so many compliments when im at work." — Troy P

settings.title: Why you'll love our underscrubs
settings.title_1: We make medical wear that performs like gym wear — for days when work feels more like a workout.
settings.title_2: Blended with spandex so that you can bend (and snap) with ease.

settings.title_1: So cosy you’ll want an extra one to wear around the house.
settings.title_2: Made with 78% recycled fabric. So you’re saving lives and saving the planet at the same time.

settings.title: Your ponytail will love this
settings.title_1: Made with off-cut scrub cap fabric — this scrunchie is rubbish in the best possible way.
settings.title_2: With a huge 6cm frill, there ain’t nothing subtle about a Dr Woof scrunchie.

settings.title: And, let’s be honest,  so will your wrist.
settings.title_1: Every Dr Woof scrunchie matches a cap in our collection, so you’ll never be without your favorite print.
settings.title_2: Buy 3 scrunchies, and watch in wonder at checkout as one becomes auto-magically free.

settings.title: Light AF
settings.text: A woven mesh knit upper and an ultra-lightweight midsole create a weightless feel —  because carrying yourself through a shift is hard enough without carrying heavy shoes.

settings.title: Extreme Comfort
settings.text: We’ve got outer casing and a signature foot-supporting lacing system — for a fit so cosy and snug it feels like a sock.

settings.title: Matchy Match
settings.text: This premium quality treat for your feet is a treat for your fashion sense too. The colour is a perfect match for our baby pink scrubs.

settings.code: SHOP BABY PINK

settings.title_2: We aim to make scrubs that still look fresh after YEARS of washing and wearing.
